about_the_game:
Dive into a journey from small-time hauler to industry mogul in "Logistics Tycoon." As the owner of a budding freight company, you start with humble beginnings - a single vehicle and a handful of contracts. Your goal? To dominate the logistics world by expanding your operations, tackling complex deliveries, and navigating diverse terrains.

Dive into the intricacies of logistics management as you build and manage a fleet of specialized vehicles. Each truck, van, and cargo plane serves a purpose in your strategic plans. Hire skilled drivers and logistics experts to streamline operations and handle the unique challenges each delivery presents.

But it's not just about moving goods from point A to point B. In "Logistics Tycoon," you'll face financial decisions that can make or break your empire. Invest in new vehicles, upgrade facilities, and negotiate contracts to maximize profits and reputation. Your choices matter as you balance risk and reward in the dynamic world of freight logistics.

Featuring realistic graphics and immersive gameplay, "Logistics Tycoon" offers endless replayability. Explore vast landscapes, from bustling cities to remote wilderness, each with its own set of logistical challenges. Whether you're navigating narrow mountain passes or bustling urban streets, every delivery is an opportunity to showcase your logistical prowess.

Are you ready to rise through the ranks and become the ultimate logistics tycoon? The road to success is paved with challenges, but with careful planning and strategic thinking, the world of logistics is yours to conquer in "Logistics Tycoon."

name: Logistics Tycoon Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win 10
  • Processor: i3
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics

short_description: Start small, think big in “Logistics Tycoon.” Begin with a single vehicle and expand your freight empire across challenging terrains. Manage a fleet, tackle challenging deliveries, and optimize logistics to grow your business. Are you ready to become the ultimate logistics tycoon?
